    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103189</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vibrating ruler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vibrierentabellierprogramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grille de tabulation de vibration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Régua vibrar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Righello di vibrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυβερνήτης δόνησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regla el vibrar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a ruler with one end fixed on the bench. Flicking the ruler up and down produces sound.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ruler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Tabellierprogramm mit 
einem Ende, das auf der Bank geregelt wird. Das Schlagen des 
Tabellierprogramms produziert auf und ab Ton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une grille de 
tabulation avec une extrémité fixée sur le mettre hors jeu. La 
chiquenaude de la grille de tabulation produit en haut et en bas le 
bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma régua com a uma 
extremidade reparada no banco. Flicking a régua acima e produz 
para baixo o som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un righello con 
un'estremità riparata sul banco. Flicking il righello su e giù
produce il suono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν κυβερνήτη με ένα 
τέλος που καθορίζεται στον πάγκο. Το τίναγμα του κυβερνήτη 
παράγει πάνω-κάτω τον ήχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una regla con un 
extremo fijado en el banco. Chasquear la regla hacia arriba y 
hacia abajo produce el sonido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabellierprogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterungen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
